net.krotscheck.dfr.csv

Class CSVDataEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.dfr.AbstractDataEncoder
      • net.krotscheck.dfr.csv.CSVDataEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IDataEncoder

    public final class CSVDataEncoder
extends AbstractDataEncoder
    CSV Data Encoder, allows us to write tuples to a data file in CSV format.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
